about.description:
Zstandard is a real-time compression algorithm, providing high compression
ratios. It offers a very wide range of compression / speed trade-off, while
being backed by a very fast decoder. It also offers a special mode for
small data, called dictionary compression, and can create dictionaries from
any sample set. Zstandard library is provided as open source software using
a BSD license.

name: zstd-static
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.19.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: zstd-static
    version: 1.4.5
source:
    fn: zstd-1.4.5.tar.gz
    sha256: 98e91c7c6bf162bf90e4e70fdbc41a8188b9fa8de5ad840c401198014406ce9e
    url: https://github.com/facebook/zstd/releases/download/v1.4.5/zstd-1.4.5.tar.gz
build:
    number: 2
    string: hc88da5d_2
requirements:
    build:
        - bzip2 1.0.8 haf1e3a3_2
        - c-ares 1.16.1 haf1e3a3_0
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - cctools_osx-arm64 949.0.1 ha30c52b_9
        - clang 11.0.0.rc1 default_hf57f61e_0
        - clang_osx-arm64 11.0.0.rc1 hd819f65_5
        - clangxx 11.0.0.rc1 default_hf57f61e_0
        - clangxx_osx-arm64 11.0.0.rc1 h199a9ea_5
        - cmake 3.18.0 h9f6fb0d_0
        - compiler-rt 11.0.0.rc1 h810911b_0
        - compiler-rt_osx-64 11.0.0.rc1 h2a69e3a_0
        - expat 2.2.9 hb1e8313_2
        - krb5 1.17.1 h14dd6a4_2
        - ld64_osx-arm64 530 h8c8ad8c_9
        - libclang-cpp11 11.0.0.rc1 default_hf57f61e_0
        - libcurl 7.71.1 he6690cf_4
        - libcxx 11.0.0.rc1 h5f48129_0
        - libedit 3.1.20191231 h0678c8f_2
        - libev 4.33 haf1e3a3_0
        - libllvm11 11.0.0.rc1 h009f743_3
        - libnghttp2 1.41.0 h8a08a2b_1
        - libssh2 1.9.0 h39bdce6_5
        - libuv 1.38.0 h0b31af3_0
        - llvm-tools 11.0.0.rc1 h1341992_3
        - make 4.3 h0b31af3_0
        - ncurses 6.2 hb1e8313_1
        - openssl 1.1.1g haf1e3a3_1
        - rhash 1.3.6 h1de35cc_1001
        - tapi 1100.0.11 h879752b_0
        - tk 8.6.10 hb0a8c7a_0
        - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 1007
    host:
        - libcxx 11.0.0.rc1 h5f48129_0
        - zstd 1.4.5 hc019d7c_2
    run:
        - libcxx >=11.0.0.rc1
        - zstd 1.4.5 hc019d7c_2
test:
    commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libzstd.a
about:
    description: 'Zstandard is a real-time compression algorithm, providing high compression

        ratios. It offers a very wide range of compression / speed trade-off, while

        being backed by a very fast decoder. It also offers a special mode for

        small data, called dictionary compression, and can create dictionaries from

        any sample set. Zstandard library is provided as open source software using

        a BSD license.

        '
    dev_url: https://github.com/facebook/zstd
    doc_url: https://facebook.github.io/zstd/zstd_manual.html
    home: http://www.zstd.net
    license: BSD-3-Clause
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: Zstandard - Fast real-time compression algorithm
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - msarahan
        - rmax
        - xhochy
